thread.title: Volkswagen offering trade-in deals for Jetta, Passat
thread.title_full: Volkswagen offering trade-in deals for Jetta, Passat

author: Jonathan Lee
title: Volkswagen offering trade-in deals for Jetta, Passat
text:
Home » Cars » Volkswagen offering trade-in deals for Jetta, Passat Volkswagen offering trade-in deals for Jetta, Passat / 7 comments 
Volkswagen is sweetening the deal for a new Jetta and Passat with an exclusive trade-in programme – the company is offering what it claims is an “irresistible price” for Volkswagen owners, and owners of cars from other brands will also be able to benefit from “attractive trade-in prices.” The programme runs until March 31. 
To recap, the facelifted Jetta was launched in September, with new features such as bi-xenon headlights with LED daytime running lights, keyless entry, power-adjustable leather seats and a new 150 PS/250 Nm 1.4 litre single turbo engine to replace the old twincharged unit. It’s now available in Trendline, Comfortline and Highline, priced at RM109,578 , RM118,578 , and RM129,578 respectively (OTR without insurance). 
Meanwhile, the new B8 Passat was launched in November – all-new from the ground up, it is lighter, more spacious and quicker than before. It is available with either a 180 PS/250 Nm 1.8 litre TSI mill on the Trendline and Comfortline models or a 220 PS/350 Nm 2.0 litre TSI unit on the top-spec Highline. Prices are RM160,937 , RM180,937 and RM200,030 respectively.
